title: Processes - Area between Curves - Functions of y

content.question: Let <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region in the first quadrant bounded above by the graph of <math alttext="y equals, 1 minus x squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and below by the graph of <math alttext="y equals, 1 minus the square root of x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>, as shown in the figure above. What is the area of the region?

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
